name: Solar System Dark Ages Archive: Outcast Belt
name_original: Solar System Dark Ages Archive: Outcast Belt
description:
It is not a game yet, just concept of how the space ship should fly in it.

Ship control: 
Simple mouse movement - camera rotation
Mouse movement + RMB - pitch and yaw (! There is a drawback, it is impossible to turn and shoot in the opposite direction at the same time!)
Q / E - roll
W / S - forward / backward
A / D - strafe
SHIFT / SPACE - height
R - rotation stop
